summary.span: Implements a basic data transfer mechanism.

span.span: Implements a basic data transfer mechanism.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口，其方法提供的数据传输格式无关的机制。 implements the interface, whose methods provide a format-independent mechanism for data transfer. 一个通常用于和拖放操作中。A is typically used with the and in drag-and-drop operations. 类提供了推荐的实现过程的接口。The class provides the recommended implementation of the interface. 建议你使用类，而无需实现自己。It is suggested that you use the class rather than implementing yourself. 多个以不同格式的数据可以存储在。Multiple pieces of data in different formats can be stored in a . 从数据中检索通过及其关联格式。Data is retrieved from a by its associated format. 因为目标应用程序可能不知道，您可以增加的数据将以适当的格式为应用程序通过将放置中的数据的可能性以多种格式。Because the target application might not be known, you can increase the likelihood that the data will be in the appropriate format for an application by placing the data in a in multiple formats. 请参阅的预定义的格式。See for the predefined formats. 您可以通过创建的实例来实现您自己的格式类。You can implement your own format by creating an instance of the class. 若要将数据存储在，将数据传递给构造函数或调用。To store data in a , pass the data to the constructor or call . 您可以将数据以多种格式添加到相同。You can add data in multiple formats to the same . 如果您希望数据添加要在其本机格式唯一的调用中检索与`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`。If you want the data you add to be retrieved in its native format only, call with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`. 可以从检索数据与兼容的任何格式。Data can be retrieved from a in any format which is compatible with . 例如，文本可以转换为 Unicode。For example, text can be converted to Unicode. 若要检索已存储的格式中的数据，请调用与`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`。To retrieve data in the format in which it was stored, call with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`. 若要确定哪些数据存储中的格式，请调用。To determine what formats the data is stored in, call . 若要确定一种格式是否可用，请调用所需的格式。To determine if a format is available, call with the desired format. 在中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，则类提供了其他方法，使其更容易处理的数据通用格式。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the class provides additional methods that make it easier to work with data in common formats. 若要添加到特定格式的数据，使用适当`Set`*格式*方法，如。To add data of a particular format to the , use the appropriate `Set`*Format* method, such as . 若要检索从特定格式的数据，首先调用相应`Contains`*格式*方法 (如) 来确定是否包含数据采用此格式，然后调用适当`Get`*格式*方法 (如) 来检索数据，如果包含它。To retrieve data of a particular format from the , first call the appropriate `Contains`*Format* method (such as ) to determine whether the contains data in that format, then call the appropriate `Get`*Format* method (such as ) to retrieve the data if the contains it. > [!NOTE] > 使用剪贴板使用图元文件格式时，可能需要特别注意的事项。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the Clipboard. 由于中的当前实现的限制使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序可能无法识别类，使用.NET Framework 的图元文件格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在这种情况下，您必须进行互操作与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口 (Api)。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). 有关详细信息，请参阅 323530，"图元文件上剪贴板是不可见对所有应用程序，"在 Microsoft 知识库文章在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. > > 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放到剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 请参阅的序列化的详细信息。See for more information on serialization. 如果目标应用程序需要非常特定的数据格式，标头添加到序列化过程中的数据可能会阻止应用程序识别你的数据。If your target application requires a very specific data format, the headers added to the data in the serialization process may prevent the application from recognizing your data. 若要保留您的数据格式，请添加你的数据作为到数组，并将传递到方法。To preserve your data format, add your data as a array to a and pass the to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加数据。The following code example adds data in a . 首先，新创建并在其中存储一个组件。First, a new is created and a component is stored in it. 然后，它检查中的相应类型的数据是否存在于。Then, it checks to see if data in the appropriate type exists in the . 在文本框中显示结果。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法不能在指定的格式中查找数据，它将尝试将数据转换为格式。If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或存储数据时将设置为自动转换`false`，此方法返回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`. 若要确定数据是否相关联，或可以转换为一种格式，请调用之前调用。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 调用有关的有效格式的数据存储在此列表。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this . > [!NOTE] > 如果存储时已指定，允许进行转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容，数据可以转换为其他格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 当`format`是，此方法返回的 utf-8 编码字符串中的应用程序面向.NET 4.5 或更高版本，并以 ANSI 编码的字符串中的应用程序面向.NET 4.0 或更低。When `format` is , this method returns a UTF-8 encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.5 or higher, and an ANSI encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.0 or lower. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索中存储的数据。The following code example retrieves the data stored in a . 首先，新使用文本数据创建。First, a new is created with text data. 然后，检索数据，其格式指定为字符串，并显示在文本框中。Then, the data is retrieved, specifying its format as a string, and displayed in a text box. 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`autoConvert`参数是`true`和此方法找不到指定的格式的数据，它会尝试将数据转换为格式。If the `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或存储数据时将设置为自动转换`false`，此方法返回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with the automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`. 如果`autoConvert`参数是`false`，此方法返回数据中指定的格式，或`null`如果找不到此格式中的没有数据。If the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`, this method returns data in the specified format, or `null` if no data in this format can be found. 若要确定数据是否相关联，或可以转换为一种格式，请调用之前调用。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 调用有关的有效格式的数据存储在此列表。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this . > [!NOTE] > 如果存储时已指定，允许进行转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容，数据可以转换为其他格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 当`format`是，此方法返回的 utf-8 编码字符串中的应用程序面向.NET 4.5 或更高版本，并以 ANSI 编码的字符串中的应用程序面向.NET 4.0 或更低。When `format` is , this method returns a UTF-8 encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.5 or higher, and an ANSI encoded string in applications that target .NET 4.0 or lower. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索中存储的数据，并使用`autoConvert`参数来指定是否将转换的数据格式。The following code example retrieves the data stored in a , using the `autoConvert` parameter to specify whether to convert the data format. 首先，新使用文本数据创建。First, a new is created with text data. 然后此示例尝试检索数据，将其格式指定为字符串而不进行格式转换，即`autoConvert`参数是`false`。Then the example tries to retrieve the data, specifying its format as a string and no format conversion, that is, the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`. 此操作会失败，因为在任何字符串数据。This operation fails because there is no string data in the . 此示例尝试检索数据，接下来，使用`autoConvert`参数设置为`true`。Next, the example tries to retrieve the data again, with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `true`. 此操作成功，结果显示在。This operation succeeds and the results are displayed in a . 此代码需要`textBox1`已创建。This code requires that `textBox1` has been created.
